definition: container for holding and pouring water (or other liquid): jug, pitcher, clay jar, jerry can, water bottle etc
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The family plate included a silver pitcher, and knives, forks and spoons.
sentences.chinese: 家庭餐具包括一个银制的大水罐，还有刀叉和汤匙。

sentences.english: This white porcelain ewer , or pouring vessel, is considered to be the among the most remarkable of all Chinese ceramics.
sentences.chinese: 此白色大口水罐，或称壶，被认为是中国陶瓷的标志。

sentences.english: It happened at the well where I was holding a jug while annie pumped.
sentences.chinese: 事情发生在井台旁，我拿著一个水罐，安妮在抽水。

sentences.english: Dick took the pitcher and went to the ale-house.
sentences.chinese: 迪克拿着水罐去了啤酒店。

sentences.english: To see the pot swallow the ladle.
sentences.chinese: 看着长柄勺被吞进水罐。

sentences.english: Before he had finished praying silently he saw Rebecca coming out with her water-jug on her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 他刚默祷完，就看见利百加肩上扛着水罐走出来。

sentences.english: In a quart pitcher, dissolve the sugar and salt in the hot water.
sentences.chinese: 取一个一夸脱水罐，将糖和盐溶解在热水中。

sentences.english: I put the jug on the banister and hastened to admit him myself.
sentences.chinese: 我把水罐放在栏杆上，连忙自己开门让他进来。

sentences.english: Well, when I picked up the can I realized it was half full.
sentences.chinese: 哦，当我拿起水罐时我发现它里面有一半儿的水。

sentences.english: Clasping her pitcher to her waist mother went to fetch water from the village near by.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈把她的水罐挟在腰间，走到近村汲水去了。

sentences.english: He walked along with a jugpoised on his head.
sentences.chinese: 他头上顶着一个水罐，保持着平衡往前走。

sentences.english: The water pots were almost exactly the same.
sentences.chinese: 他的两个水罐几乎完全一样。

sentences.english: You get a special CLEAR half-gallon Glass Jug.
sentences.chinese: 你得到一个特别清楚的一半加仑玻璃水罐。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses a baking air-inducing device at the bottom of a ladle.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型提供了一种钢水罐罐底烘烤引风装置。

sentences.english: A pitcher of ice water sweat on a hot day.
sentences.chinese: 盛著冰水的水罐表面在热天会结水珠。
终于，他找到了一个大水罐。

definition: to ladle water/to scoop up water
water intake/to obtain water (from a well etc)
washbowl/basin for washing hands and face/CL:個|个[ge4]
washbowl/basin for washing hands and face
